perc_total_100_20_using_devices.long_description: Percent of the total population with a fast internet speed, which is defined as above 100/20 MB/S and able to stream HD video on multiple devices or download large files quickly. Geographies: Block group (12), Census tract (11), County (5), Health District (51_hd)
perc_total_100_20_using_devices.long_name: Percent of the Total Population with Fast Internet Speed
perc_total_100_20_using_devices.short_description: Percent of the total population with a fast internet speed, which is defined as above 100/20 MB/S and able to stream HD video on multiple devices or download large files quickly. Geographies: Block group (12), Census tract (11), County (5), Health District (51_hd)
perc_total_100_20_using_devices.statement: {value} of the total population in {features.name} has a fast internet speed.
